00019 rn_link *
00020 rc_getroute(ip_state * state, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00021 {
00022         rn_machine      *me = rn_getmachine(lp->id);
00023         rn_link         *link = NULL;
00024 
00025         /*
00026          * Get the next_hop destination from the forwarding table 
00027          * for this IP packet.
00028          */
00029         if(msg->src == lp->id && me->nlinks == 1)
00030                 link = me->link;
00031         else if(NULL == (link = rn_getlink(me, msg->dst)))
00032                 link = ip_route(me, msg);
00033 
00034         return link;
00035 }
00036

00038 ip_rc_downstream(ip_state * state, rn_message * msg, tw_lp * lp)
00039 {
00040         tw_memory       *b;
00041         //tw_event      *e;

00043

00053                 ip_rc_packet_drop(state, msg, lp);
